name: Maniram Kumar
about: I am a passionate artist who loves to explore different mediums and techniques to create unique and inspiring artwork. My work is a reflection of my creativity and imagination.

artworks.title: Sunset Bliss
artworks.description: An acrylic painting capturing the beauty of a sunset over the ocean.

artworks.title: Abstract Vibes
artworks.description: A vibrant abstract piece that explores color and movement.

artworks.title: Portrait of Serenity
artworks.description: A pencil sketch portraying calmness and inner peace.
